title: LF Bronze/Silver Support and ADC
body:
Looking for a botlane to fill out my ranked team called Eclipse (ECL), have some good teammates already in the other roles.

Must be able to voice chat in some way and be competent at the game.

Leave a reply below if you're interested with your role, rank and name.

Thanks all!

IGN: LetsTwitch
Skype: letstwitch

replies.body: Sup main. Bronze right now want to join team for some fun and to grow as a player. Silver last year
Adc main - currently bronze but ended on bronze 1 last season climbed to silver 1 after season ended  ;)

Last season gold
Main support, play all of the meta ones, main thresh, alistar, morg and braum
Currently s3 i use skype and ign raymod
Added in-game, you're skype is extremely common so I cant find that
